skills.name: Lady's Fury (淑女の怒り)
text: After [Main Battery Salvo], 40% chance to set all enemies on [Fire], dealing 110% of Firepower over 10 seconds.

skills.name: War Experience (歴戦の経験)
text: During battle, when an enemy ship is sunk by [Fire], 100% chance to reduce [Main Battery Salvo] reload time for all allies by 3 seconds. Can proc up to 5 times per battle.

skills.name: Lady's Dignity(淑女の矜持)
text: When entering a battle, all alies obtains a barrier, equivalent to 20% of each ship Max HP, that absorbs [Torpedo Salvo] damage.
